homepage.bodypage: With over thirty (30) years of experience, SECU-PLUS operates throughout the national territory and offers global and adapted solutions.

about.title: About us

sub: With over thirty (30) years of experience, SECU-PLUS operates throughout the national territory...

activities.title: Our Services
activities.technicalStaffDescription: Over 30 years at the service of your security

projects.title: Professional References
projects.subtitle: We work with large companies and institutions, both local and international. Serious actors who trust us with strategic projects.
projects.engagement_text: We guarantee our clients high security standards, adapted to their specific needs. We earn their trust by delivering quality work.

contact.title: Contact us
contact.paragraph1: Thank you for your interest in our company. We're here to support your construction projects from concept to completion. For inquiries, please email us at {{email}}.
contact.paragraph2: We strive to respond to all messages within 24 hours.
